meanings.definition: To catch fish using a dipnet.
meanings.sent1: She dipnetted some fish at the lake.
meanings.sent2: He always dipnetted successfully in the river.
meanings.sent3: The bear tried to dipnet some fish but failed comically.
meanings.sent4: Her words dipnetted the truth from the sea of lies.
meanings.sent5: The image of the fisherman dipnetting stayed in my mind.

meanings.definition: Having been caught using a dipnet.
meanings.sent2: The dipnetted salmon was a prized catch.
meanings.sent3: The dipnetted trout looked surprised in the bucket.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes revealed a dipnetted secret.
meanings.sent5: The dipnetted crab scuttled away in the sand.
